Electrical, Starting Systems 08

CRANK (START) RELAY, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Diagnosis

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Engines A08-1021 Models, ALL 0.6

CRANK INHIBIT RELAY, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. Diagnosis

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Engines Automatic Transmission A08-1026 Models, ALL 0.5

STARTER, Diagnostics

Includes:
1. Perform Battery Diagnostic
2. Perform battery load test
3. Check alternator output
4. Perform voltage drop test
5. Perform starter circuit test

Notes:
1. Not to be used in conjunction with alternator or battery diagnostics

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Starter Motor A08-3260 Models, ALL 0.4
Air Starter A08-3261 Models, ALL 1.0

STARTER MOTOR, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R and/or replace starting system magnetic switch (relay)

Excludes:
1. STARTER, DIAGNOSTIC

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
Cummins Engines All Starters A08-3219 7000 1.2
Cummins Engines All Starters A08-3219 8600 1.2
DT466/530/570 All Starters A08-3220 Models, ALL 0.9
Cat Engines All Starters A08-3222 7600 1.0
Cat Engines All Starters A08-3222 8600 1.0
VT275 All Starters A08-3223 CF 500/600 0.9
MaxxForce 9/10/DT All Starters A08-3224 Models, ALL 1.2
MaxxForce 7 All Starters A08-4220 Models, ALL 0.8
Non-International Big Bore Engines All Starters A08-4221 ProStar 1.5
VT365 All Starters A08-4222 Models, ALL 0.7
MaxxForce 11/13 A08-5220 Models, ALL 1.4 |

Addon If Required   Code Applies To Hours
BELLY PAN - PRE '07 RE BUS ONLY, Remove & Reinstall        
Rear Pan Only A08-3220-1 Models, ALL 0.7

STARTING MOTOR DRIVE ASSEMBLY, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R starter
3. Diagnosis

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Other Engines All Starters A08-230 Models, ALL 1.9
International Engines All Starters A08-231 Models, ALL 1.7

STARTING MOTOR SOLENOID, Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts
2. R&R starter
3. Diagnosis

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Other Engines All Starters A08-240 Models, ALL 1.7
All International Engines All Starters A08-241 Models, ALL 1.5

STARTING SYSTEM MAGNETIC SWITCH (RELAY), Replace

Includes:
1. Remove and replace component and reinstall all related parts

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
All Starters A08-3280 Models, ALL 1.1

WARRANTY OPERATIONS NOT COVERED IN THIS SECTION, T-Time

Notes:
1. This is not to be used to code diagnosis, testing or cleaning of operations already covered in this section. The time for those items is included in the operation. A written description or explanation must accompany each

Component Qualifier Code Applies To Hours
T-TIME A08-T1 Models, ALL 0.0
T-TIME A08-T2 Models, ALL 0.0
T-TIME A08-T3 Models, ALL 0.0
